RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HONEY DIJON traded a bump with PERMED at the start, chased just off the inside before briefly tipping to the three path when the leader took over the space in front half a mile from home, tucked back to the two path into the turn and advanced on that rival knocking heads midway before coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch taking over the front, drew clear under a drive to prevail. INTO STARS struck the off side stall at the start, chased along the inside, began to get out a bit greenly near the seven-sixteenths and got corrected with a right handed crop and a stiff left rein and scraped the paint three furlongs from home, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while keeping on to secure the place honors. PERMED traded a bump at the start with HONEY DIJON, came under hustling and chased four then three wide under coaxing from the half mile pole, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages while along for the show honors. SEVEN NATTY PATTY coaxed from the gate, showed the way lightly coaxed along three then two wide before tucking inside through the turn, came under increasing pressure from HONEY DIJON to the outside through the turn and was headed for command when cutting the corner into upper stretch, then weakened in the late stages. MY STARSHIP brushed the near side stall at the start, chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and tired. BOBBY JEAN broke out at the start and was corrected, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Into Stars
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, chased ins, tried to get out 7/16, 2w 1/4, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Permed
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, hustled st, chased 4-3w, 5-6w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Honey Dijon
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 2-3w, advanced, up 3w upper, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: My Starship
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate, 5w backstretch, coaxed 2p 3/8, 3-4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Seven Natty Patty
ENTRY.OWNER: Baccari Racing Stable LLC and Dream Walkin Farms Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: lightly coaxed 3-2w, ins turn, headed, cut corner, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Bobby Jean
ENTRY.OWNER: Lake Star Stable and Lewis R Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, 6w early, 3w turn, 4-5w upper, trailed throughout

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of ASC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Claiming Purse 43000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwi se Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PHINNEYS HARBOR came away alertly from the outside post, tracked the solo leader on the outside, engaged that foe in the three path on the turn, took the advantage outside the quarter-pole, was put to a left-handed crop into upper stretch then shook clear, switched to a right-handed crop while remaining on her inside lead at the furlong marker, was guided in outside the sixteenth-pole then given one final pop of a right-handed crop, remained on her inside lead under a strong hand-ride while being flagged with the crop to the finish and just held to prevail. CAUSE I'M ELEGANT was urged along at the rear, dropped back while caught in the five path early on the turn then angled to the rail before the three-eighths, saved ground from that point into the stretch then moved out around the three-sixteenths, rallied in the final furlong, gained into the final sixteenth and closed with good courage but just missed while clear for the place. TERESA was hustled from the gate then carried in early, bumped with a rival near the five-eighths then attempted to savage that foe briefly before being pulled out by the rider, climbed some near the seven-sixteenths, went three to four wide on the turn, was driven five wide into the stretch, kept on in pursuit of the winner in the final furlong and finished willingly for the show. STRANGE FRUIT was urged along on the outside, chased in the four path for most of the turn then moved to the five path, spun six wide into the stretch, pursued the winner in the drive and lacked the needed kick. MONTAUK MYSTIQUE went to the front then moved towards the inside, showed the way with a clear advantage, was challenged to her outside while inside to the two path on the turn, lost the advantage to the winner outside the quarter-pole and gave way. KNOCKZCATOFFZFENCE broke in then was hustled, settled towards the back after being taken in hand briefly early, angled out leaving the backstretch, went four then five wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. MAGNOLIA WIND was sent hard from the start, bumped with a foe near the five-eighths, chased in the two path on the turn and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Knockzcatoffzfence
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in,hstld,settld,angld out7/16,4-5w,6w1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Magnolia Wind
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard,bumped5/8,chased 2path turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Teresa
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,carried in,urgd,bmp5/8,climbed7/16,3-4w,5w1/4,willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Montauk Mystique
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,mvd in,pace,ins-2path turn,headed1/4,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Cause I'm Elegant
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,at rear,drop back 5w7/16,rail3/8,mvd out3/16,rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Strange Fruit
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along outside,chased 4-5p turn,6p into lane,outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Phinneys Harbor
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk fast,trckd outside,bid7/16,3p turn,lead1/4,clr,ins lead,held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 95. Claiming Purse 50000. INNER TURF (UP TO $8,700 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLDS. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $35,000 (1.5% Af tercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TALLAHATCHIEBRIDGE chased just off the pace two to three wide down the backstretch before tucking inside into the far turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths and advanced on the leader to take over command before swinging four then three wide into upper stretch, then went clear under a drive to prevail. OUR COUNTRY struck the off side stall at the start and conceded five lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased five wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while running on to secure the place honors. ROCK THE WEEKEND chased four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went eight wide into upper stretch, improved position to secure the show honors along well clear and best of the rest. AMANI'S EAGLE established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, yielded the front and floated five to six wide into upper stretch, then tired in the drive. HONOR LEO JEAN leapt up in the gate fractious before the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went six to seven wide into upper stretch and tired. MORE THAN WORK stumbled badly at the start falling to his face and tossed the rider in the process, got apprehended by outrider following the finish and walked off under his own power. There was a Stewards' Inquiry into the start focusing on MORE THAN WORK before the result was allowed to stand and the race was declared official.

ENTRY.NAME: Tallahatchiebridge

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of BTC

ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace 2-3w, coaxed ins 3/8, floated 4-3w uppr, went clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

ENTRY.NAME: More Than Work
ENTRY.OWNER: Politano James and Northeast Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly st, lost rider

ENTRY.NAME: Honor Leo Jean
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate,chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, angled 6-7w uppr, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Amani's Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, coaxed 3/8, yielded, floated 5-6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Our Country
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, chased 5w, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, no match, up for 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Rock the Weekend
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 7/16, 8w upper, improved, best of rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 95. Claiming Purse 60000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRUCULENT broke fast and went straight to the front, moved in early then relinquished the advantage to a hustled rival, stalked the pace on the outside in the three path, took the lead near the five-sixteenths, shook clear under a strong hand-ride in upper stretch, was given one pop of a right-handed crop into the final furlong, drifted in coming to the sixteenth-pole and proved much the best under a hand-ride to the finish. ROCCO STRONG broke in then was corrected by the rider, went four wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, passed the half-mile pole under coaxing, was roused four wide on the final turn, chased outside into the final furlong and proved no match for the winner while able to get the place. DATESFREEDOM broke awkwardly and was off a step slow, was caught five wide under tight restraint early on the first turn then was wrestled back under a vigorous hold, dropped in over heels outside the seven-eighths pole then advanced quickly on the inside, moved up inside the leader outside the three-quarter pole then dropped back just off the pace, was roused late on the backstretch, chased inside to the two path on the final turn, kept on some in the stretch and earned the show. MY FRIENDS BEER was bumped soundly shortly after the start, traveled around the opening bend in the two path under snug restraint, dropped back early on the backstretch then settled at the rear, was roused in the two path early on the far turn, moved to the three path late on that bend then was driven five wide into the stretch and failed to respond. TWO THIRTY FIVE was hustled from the gate then bumped soundly with an opponent just after the start, moved from the rail to the two path on the first turn, showed the way while held together under snug restraint, vied in the two path under urging on the far turn, was headed near the five-sixteenths, dropped back in upper stretch and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Two Thirty Five
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd soundly after brk,hustled to lead,ins-2p,headed5/16,faded

ENTRY.NAME: My Friends Beer
ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC WLIR Racing Stables Acqua No
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd hard after brk,2p1st,drop back3/4,ask2-3p2nd,5w1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Rocco Strong
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing Four Corners Racing and Cory Moelis Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,corrected,4p1st,settled,roused 4p2nd,chased,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Datesfreedom
ENTRY.COMMENT: akwrd brk,step slw,wrestld back5w1st,rail7/8,mvd up,ins-2p,clr3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Truculent
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk fast,stalked outside 3p,lead5/16,clr3/16,drift in1/16,drw awy

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS D'OR CHERIE four wide in aim of the front, advanced tucking to the two path into the turn to press the leader from the outside, took over command nearing the quarter pole and swung three then two wide into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive kept to task. BOOK OF WISDOM chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, ran on to chase the winner home well clear of the rest and along second best. MY MANE SQUEEZE broke out at the start bumping EKWANOK, chased along the inside down the backstretch before tipping two to three wide at the half mile pole, came under coaxing just off the inside at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and improved position just holding for the show honors on the wire. RECENCY got away to an awkward start, then got bumped by SUPERSTARSUSAN and conceded four lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals just missing for the show honors at the end. EKWANOK got bumped at the start by MY MANE SQUEEZE, then got forced to steady off the heels of PRETTY UP five and a half furlongs from home as that rival crossed in front and conceded about a length of ground and position, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and weakened. SNARKY established the front shortly after the start and showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside half a mile from home and came under intensifying pressure from the eventual winner to the outside and was placed to coaxing in response with five-sixteenths to go, yielded the front and took the inside route into upper stretch, then tired through to the finish. PRETTY UP got away to a stutter step start, crossed to chased just off the inside just off the pace, tucked inside into the turn and came under light coaxing when beginning to fade at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and folded. REALTA steadied after the start when PRETTY UP tucked in front and conceded three lengths to the front, chased along the inside coming under urging at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and made no impact. SUPERSTARSUSAN broke in at the start bumping RECENCY and then got steadied conceding four lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and was unable to make an impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Snarky
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, under pressure turn ins, yielded, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: My Mane Squeeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased ins, tip 2-3w 1/2, 2w 1/4p, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Ekwanok
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, steady 5 1/2, chased 5-4w, 6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Realta
ENTRY.COMMENT: steady after st, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Recency
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward, bumped st, chased 3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w uppr, by tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Superstarsusan
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable Mitre Box Stable and Big Toe Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in, steady st, chased 5-6w, coaxed 3w 3/8, 4w uppr, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: stutter step st, chased 2p,coaxed ins 7/16, faded, 2w 1/4, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Book of Wisdom
ENTRY.OWNER: Parkland Thoroughbreds Fowler Barry and Magic Cap Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, ran on, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Miss d'Or Cherie
ENTRY.OWNER: Reeves Thoroughbred Racing and Rocco Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w in aim, pressed 2p turn, up 3-2w upper, edged clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 83000. (UP TO $14,442 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (For Horses That Sold or RNA for $50,000 Or Less In Their Most Recent Sale).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LE DOM BRO broke out then bumped with a foe and bothered several rivals in concert with the runner-up, contested the pace on the inside of that opponent, vied along the rail on the turn, spun three wide into the stretch under pressure, dueled inside of the runner-up while brushing multiple times with that foe in the final furlong and gamely prevailed. WALSTIB broke in then bumped with a foe and bothered several opponents in unison with the winner, disputed the pace on the outside of that rival, vied in the two path on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch, dueled outside of the winner in the drive, brushed multiple times with that one in the final furlong and was denied while well clear for the place. FIRST TRUMPET chased the top two on the outside then in the three path on the turn, was driven five wide into the stretch, pursued the leaders under a drive into the final furlong and weakened while clear for the show. SECRET LOVER broke a bit awkwardly then was sandwiched and checked very sharply, was urged along at the rear, traveled around the turn in the two path and improved position. KHANATE was bumped at the start then forced hard into another rival and checked, spotted the front several lengths, went three then four wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. DON VINO VICI was sent hard from the start, chased the pace down the backstretch, dropped back near the half-mile pole, fell further back while moving from the rail to the four path on the turn, spun six wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. TWENTYEIGHTTOTHREE was bumped hard on both sides just after the start then checked sharply, spotted the front many lengths, raced well off the pace under urging, moved from the two path to the five path on the turn, came seven wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. COWBOY LUKE was bumped at the start then forced into another rivals, chased the pace down the backstretch, dropped back while inside to the two path on the turn and capitulated. ALWAYS DIALED was bumped hard on both sides just after the start then checked, spotted the front several lengths, raced well off the pace while ridden along, went three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and failed to respond. GAME MISCONDUCT was urged along on the outside, went five wide on the turn, dropped to the three path coming to the quarter-pole and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Walstib
ENTRY.OWNER: Magdalena Racing (Sherri McPeek) and David A Bernsen LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,bmpd,outside pace,2p turn,4p1/4,dueled,brushed,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Don Vino Vici
ENTRY.OWNER: Sal-Lou J G Stable Cotrone Robert and Carmine Cirrincione Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard,chased pace,drop back1/2,ins-4p turn,6p1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Le Dom Bro
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,bmp,hstld,pace ins foe,rail turn,3p1/4,dueled,brshd,game

ENTRY.NAME: Cowboy Luke
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,forced into foe,chased,ins-2path turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Twentyeighttothree
ENTRY.OWNER: Politano James and Fisher Chaz R
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd btwn brk,checked sharply,urged,2-5p turn,7p1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Always Dialed
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd both sides brk,checked,3w turn,4w1/4,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Lover
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start,bmpd btwn,checked very sharply,2p turn,improved

ENTRY.NAME: Khanate
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,forced hard into foe,checked,3-4w turn,5w1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: First Trumpet
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased outside,3path turn,5p into lane,weakened,clear for show

ENTRY.NAME: Game Misconduct
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along outside,5wide turn,3wide 1/4,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 149500. (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Weight, 12 2 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At Any Distance Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time OfC laim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Eighth on the Main Track). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALPHA BELLA coaxed from the gate intent on the lead, showed the way along the inside through the first turn and then just off the inside down the backstretch and through the far turn, floated out four wide into upper stretch, went clear through the stretch to the finish while in hand to prevail comfortably at the end. VIRTUAL REALITY just off the inside latched on the aforementioned foe through the first turn, attended that rival from the three path down the backstretch, came under coaxing briefly and got out four then five wide at the three-eighths coming under a right handed crop, cornered five wide into upper stretch thoroughly shaken off and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Virtual Reality
ENTRY.COMMENT: latched on 3p, got out 4-5w 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Alpha Bella
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, floated 4w upper, went clear

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of NEW

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 35000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGICAL WAYS moved up to get the lead then showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside on the turn, lost the advantage under the crop in upper stretch, drifted out some outside the furlong marker, fought back gamely to get the lead again in the final sixteenth, fought with the runner-up to the finish and narrowly prevailed under strong urging. MOVING PICTURES pressed then chased the pace, engaged the leader in the three path on the turn, took the advantage under urging in upper stretch, drifted out under a left-handed crop near the furlong marker, swapped back to his inside lead at the sixteenth-pole, lost the advantage back to the winner in the final sixteenth, battled with that foe under a solid hand-ride to the finish and just missed but was well clear for the place. PAPI ON ICE bobbled slightly at the start, dropped well off the pace, went five then six wide on the turn, drifted inward in upper stretch and was along for the show. SOUNDS SPOOKY chased the pace down the backstretch, raced in the two path early on the turn, shifted four then five wide later on that bend, came seven wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. SWAY'SINMYDNA lost his footing at the start, settled between foes, dropped from the four path to the two path under urging on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and came up empty. PINE VALLEY chased the pace on the outside, dropped back in the four path on the turn, spun six wide into the stretch and capitulated. SCOTTO was taken up while pinched back between horses at the start then dropped back, raced at the rear, went two to three wide on the turn and was no factor. WITH KNOW NAME came inward at the start, was urged along off the pace, dropped back leaving the backstretch, saved ground on the turn and had nothing left. GINNSU WARRIOR was urged along towards the rear, moved from the rail to the two path on the turn and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Ginnsu Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along, ins-2patht turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Magical Ways
ENTRY.OWNER: Roman, Lawrence P. and Jacobson, David
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up,set pace,ins turn,headed3/16,drift out,fought back,game

ENTRY.NAME: Scotto
ENTRY.OWNER: Cipriano Vito Scotti Neil Alfleri Anthony and Bochilo Vincent
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched back start,at rear,2-3path turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: With Know Name
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in brk,urged along,drop back 7/16,ins turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Moving Pictures
ENTRY.OWNER: Werner J Stable and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed,chsd,vied3p trn,lead3/16,drift out1/8,led past1/16,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Sounds Spooky
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace,2-5path turn,7w into lane,lckd needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Papi On Ice
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled bit brk,well back,5-6wide turn,drift in 3/16,up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Sway'sinmydna
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost footing brk,settled btwn,urged 4-2path turn,mvd out,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Pine Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased outside,dropped back 4path turn,6p into lane,capitulated

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 9 1M Dirt CR: 94. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. INNER TURF (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUERTE broke in at the start bumping MIGHTY ATLAS, chased along the inside patiently handled until set down angled five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, drew clear under a drive to prevail. MIGHTY ATLAS got bumped solidly at the start by the aforementioned foe, chased along the inside coming under prolonged urging from the half mile pole, steadily threaded through rival and angled six wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while along to just get up for the place honors in the final jump. SOUTH STREET coaxed from the start, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch, kept on under a drive and was nailed at the finish for the place honors while clear for the show. MIRACLE MIKE coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, angled six to seven wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to the finish. KINGFISH STEVENS established the front and showed the way in hand along the inside under some pressure from the presence of BUCKORTWO to the outside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared just outside the eighth pole, then weakened through to the finish. DEPUTY CONNECT coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch, weakened. BUCKORTWO coaxed from the gate, prompted the leader from the outside three then two wide, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. YONO chased five to six paths off the inside coming under prolonged coaxing from the half mile pole, went eight to nine wide into upper stretch, made no impact. SKATE TO HEAVEN four then three wide through the first turn, chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch until tucked inside at the half mile pole, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, offered no response. KINGDOM ON PAWS showed brief speed three wide, came under coaxing four wide at the three-eighths in retreat, went five wide into upper stretch and faltered in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Mighty Atlas
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased ins, coaxed 1/2, 6w upper, no match, up for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Suerte
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased ins, set down 5w upper, up 1/8, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Miracle Mike
ENTRY.OWNER: Franklin Ave Equine LLC and International Equine
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 7/16, 6-7w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Yono
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-6w, coaxed 1/2, 8-9w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Deputy Connect
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Kingdom On Paws
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 3w, coaxed 4w 3/8, 5w upper, faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Claiming Purse 52000. (UP TO $9,048 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAY ZONE was hustled from the gate, pressed the pace on the outside, vied in the four path on the turn, took the lead at the five-sixteenths, drifted out a bit under a right-handed crop in upper stretch and edged clear under strong urging. KASIMBA showed speed then set the pace under pressure from both sides, vied in the two path early on the turn, lugged out to the three path under extra left-rein pressure outside the five-sixteenths then lost the advantage to the winner, drifted out in upper stretch, was guided inward in the final furlong and safely secured the place while unable to go with the winner. OFF THE CLOCK was re-positioned in the gate then taken up while in tight between foes early, raced on the outside while ridden along, went five wide on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and lacked the needed kick while able to get the show. DREAMWITHINADREAM was ridden along off the pace, went around the turn in the two path, swung six wide into upper stretch and gained some but failed to impact. BOLT D'PLATA broke a bit slow then was checked, dropped well behind the rest of the field, saved ground on the turn, came out into the stretch and was no factor. THE COMPAS MAN (IRE) was hustled from the start, showed speed then pressed the pace on the inside, dropped back at the half-mile pole, chased inside on the turn and tired.
